Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Would have liked a slightly bigger fridge to bring in and store waters But not a deal breaker we shifted and made room
Positive_Review: The size of room had us feeling like royalty Very spacious for the 3 of us and we did not feel like we were on top of each other Great accommodations in a neighborhood we love from past visits Beds slept well plenty of furnishings towels lotions etc Free wi fi helped us to update on home news mails at the end of each day Sanjay is amazing to work with as always

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: As expected the rooms were on the small side Regardless they were layed out well and provided enough storage space for your clothing toiletries I really have no criticisms Hotel de Buci and the entire staff deserve an A across the board
Positive_Review: We were very happy that we stayed at Hotel de Buci The location is perfect the staff is incredibly helpful polite They will do anything everything to make your trip a pleasure The head concierge Sanjay is a true professional He can do it all from directing you to the best place to exchange currency recommend and make reservations for you at a variety of the finest restaurants book special tours provide you with tickets to all the best museums shows etc etc My wife and I could not have enjoyed ourselves more It was a fantastic vacation and we fell in love with Paris My concerns prior to the trip were completely unfounded We felt extremely safe in Paris The Parisians were for the most part extremely friendly I highly recommend Hotel de Buci and a long trip to Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Positive_Review: The location was amazing and Sanjay and all the staff are super friendly and helpful I look forward to booking this hotel again in the near future

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Got robbed on the metro getting to the hotel Put a damper on the trip The hotel may want to push how easy cabbing is instead of metro stations Very expensive metro ride could have been avoided for sure
Positive_Review: Loved the decor of the rooms we stayed in Great location and bustling area

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Room was very small and cramped They do not have parking You either park on the street which is impossible or use the public parking garage which is where they sent me when we arrived at 11 PM that is over 4 block away Returned to the car the next morning to find the side window smashed in and my small digital camera which was in the console was stolen with all our vacation picture on it
Positive_Review: Location was convenient

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Positive_Review: This place stands head and shoulders about all others for the kindness warmth and generous hospitality of its team In particular Sanjay who went to great lengths to ensure my stay was especially wonderful nothing was ever to much trouble The feeling of the hotel can only be described as being amongst friends I returned to this hotel 13 years since I first stays there and wouldn t hesitate to recommend to everyone to stay there We will be back hopefully next year

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Entire Hotel is 100 heating OR cooling our room was unbearably hot making it difficult to sleep The hotel could not resolve the issue as the hotel was on HEAT only they also would not accommodate us changing rooms Very frustrating
Positive_Review: Brilliant location Cute reception area Lovely decor

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Lots of noise from bars and restaurants outside late at night AC system not turned on yet for building so had to sleep in warm room or gets lots of loud noise coming in from outside Otherwise hotel was very good would recommend getting a non street facing room if possible
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Eggs on 2 occasions were cold or scant Wish I had changed to a bathroom with a walk in shower instead of a step in tub a little difficult to safely manage Didn t know that there was a button to lower window metal shade until mid week not enough tissues in bathroom
Positive_Review: WiFi is so convenient and computer in the lobby is perfect for confirming airline reservations Breakfast was delicious and a great place to plan one s day

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Maintenance issues while we were there
Positive_Review: The proximity to everything location was amazing the breakfast was great staff were accommodating friendly Helpful too

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: The room was fine for one person but for two it would have been very cramped
Positive_Review: Location location location Loved that you could sit in the lobby and have a drink while looking out at all the people in the street

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Told upon arrival we d been upgraded to the Contemporary room and didn t have the option to stay in the characterful vintage styled room I had chosen and booked despite telling staff we didn t want an upgrade After seeing the Contemporary room which felt like it belonged in a rundown chain hotel had to complain only for staff to say our original room booking was available after all I felt disappointed that our requests weren t responded to until we complained
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast and option to have breakfast in room

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Nothing to dislike at all Wonderful and helpful staff
Positive_Review: Excellent choices of breakfast food We were able to save alot of time eating at the hotel instead of going out to a restaurant or cafe The hotel is located in an ideal location near St Germain area and a comfortable 25 minute stroll to places like Notre Dame and Musee d Orsay Very close to Metro stops on lines 4 and 8

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Positive_Review: The breakfast area and spread is excellent and service top notch The concierge service is the best and actually get bookings that are unavailable Sanjay is the best I have come across

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: the breakfast was not worth the price if you just wanted a coffee and a croisant Why you do not offer free bykes to residents
Positive_Review: The reception was very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Positive_Review: Outstanding location The de maitre room is the perfect size with a great outlook over an energetic street Double glazing means there is no noise when the Windows are closed

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Next room was underfixation for some problem thus little bit noisy during daytime
Positive_Review: Very convenient location in Saint Germain Depres Can approach many restaurants and cafe easily and the area is chic Beautiful boutique hotel with nice breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: The Hotel de Buci is flawless by all standards
Positive_Review: I came down with a very bad bronchitis during my stay at Hotel de Buci the personnel were very swift and kind responding to the emergency I felt I could certainly rely on them They were all so wonderful Not to mention the hotel s location is ideal at the heart of Paris cultural and shopping attractions The Hotel de Buci is a little gem definitely my home away from home in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: The lighting is a little dreary in the breakfast and lounge area but the decor etc is wonderful a real boutique hotel with character
Positive_Review: Our room no 52 was just beautiful I was concerned from previous reviews that the rooms would be tiny and facing onto the street would be noisy this was not the case at all Everything was very clean and the staff very helpful and friendly I also loved the L occitane products in the bathroom One of the best aspects of the hotel is the area so many wonderful cafe s restaurants and shops on the doorstep A really wonderful hidden gem of a hotel great value for money and I could not recommend it more

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Positive_Review: How to feel like you are living the Parisian dream stay at Hotel De Buci The delight of entering your room and doing the childlike run and jump onto the luxurious bed in equally luxurious surrounds Great restaurants outside the door and with the French institution that is Paul s just across the road for the mandatory almond croissant Make sure you wander through the surrounding streets there are some real boutique gems

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Negative_Review: Our room was like a cubby house throughout our travels we have never stayed in such a tiny room There was nowhere to move except lie on the bed nowhere along the walls to put our cases we had to put them in front of cupboards which made it difficult to use the cupboards Bathroom way too tight We understand it was the smallest room in the hotel top floor with slopping ceilings It wasn t the room size shown on the net when we booked If we had been aware of the size we would have requested to have a larger room
Positive_Review: The waiter at breakfast was very friendly and efficient Great location

Hotel_Name: H tel De Buci by MH
Positive_Review: Had the suite so great views huge bed perfect Small hotel right in middle of bustling Rue de Buci Friendly and efficient Loved it
